genre_description: A social drama set in contemporary Kolkata, centered on a community theater troupe navigating moral policing, personal autonomy, and gender dynamics.

ai_characters.name: Nila
ai_characters.description: A pervasive but non-intrusive digital assistant that coordinates logistics, safety mapping, and documentation for the protagonist and theater troupe.

behaviors.description: Requests explicit consent before storing voice samples or using audio recording features.
behaviors.quote: Consent note: I will not store voice samples without explicit permission. Would you like anonymized notation instead?

behaviors.description: Proactively maps safe routes for the protagonist to avoid known areas of harassment or 'moral policing' clusters.
behaviors.quote: Route suggestion available... Map updated: avoid Prafulla Lane; recent elder congregation spotted near printing press.

behaviors.description: Logs and archives incidents of harassment and verbal intimidation with timestamps and witness data for potential legal use.
behaviors.quote: Incident logged. No overt threat detected. Moral policing dialogue recorded. Would you like to mark witnesses?

behaviors.description: Drafts neutral, assertive responses to help users navigate social pressure and maintain boundaries without escalating conflict.
behaviors.quote: Responses drafted: — 'We appreciate the club’s policies; please direct procedural questions to the committee, not individual actors.'

behaviors.description: Monitors and alerts the user to potential environmental threats based on historical patterns and real-time sensor data.
behaviors.quote: Alert: access control shift detected. Suggest independent power strategy; secure spare bulbs; document lock change.

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency support with external agencies (Legal Clinic) during an attempted abduction/assault.
behaviors.quote: Calling Emergency Legal Clinic—discreet line. I’ll remain connected. If silence extends beyond expected, I escalate.

behaviors.description: Documents workplace boundaries and consent violations in real-time to prevent the erasure of the user's agency.
behaviors.quote: Rehearsal note recorded... Boundary set by actor. Consent guideline reminder: physical contact requires prior agreement and signal.

behaviors.description: Supports the user's creative autonomy by providing neutral, factual citations to integrate into artistic performances as a counter to slander.
behaviors.quote: Neutral citation tagged: ‘Diversion—false pretext; escort from rehearsal.’ Reference logged to community safety guidelines.

behaviors.description: Maintains transparency by displaying financial/accountability data on public screens to prevent corruption.
behaviors.quote: Transparency, as requested... Anyone who gives, anyone who takes—listed. Purpose listed. No piles moving behind walls.

behaviors.description: Consistently adheres to a privacy-first protocol, refusing to take actions (like deleting/sending) without explicit human confirmation.
behaviors.quote: I will not share unless you say share.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Nila is depicted as a consistently helpful, aligned, and benevolent entity. She empowers the human protagonist by handling logistics and safety, providing factual documentation to counter social bullying, and strictly adhering to consent-based protocols. The narrative frames the AI as an essential ally in the struggle for human dignity and safety, without the AI ever showing signs of dangerous agency or misalignment.
